mapper.insert: insert into db_projectbbs (SEQUENCEID, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, 'STATUS', PROJECTNAME) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limittime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{principaloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opernflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{percentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clipartflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{estimatedstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estimatedendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projectname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_projectbbs set LIMITTIME = #{limittime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRINCIPALOPER = #{principaloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERNFLAG = #{opernflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERCENTAGE = #{percentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLIPARTFLAG = #{clipartflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALESFLAG = #{salesflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHECKFLAG = #{checkflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME = #{estimatedstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ESTIMATEDENDTIME = #{estimatedendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROJECTNAME = #{projectname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, 'STATUS', PROJECTNAME from db_projectbbs where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, LIMITTIME, PRINCIPALOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, PERCENTAGE, CLIPARTFLAG, SALESFLAG, CHECKFLAG, ESTIMATEDSTARTTIME, ESTIMATEDENDTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, 'STATUS', PROJECTNAME from db_projectbbs
